Subject: PingCastle, how to ignore domain trusts?
Description:
I went through the documentation and I failed to find information on how to restricts the scan to not include “Domain Trusts” as it might easily lead to a situation where the scan is including resources that are out of scope of the planned scan.

Could you connect me with someone who could help with this?
Solution_Comment__c: Explained, that when running healthcheck - there is no need to exclude the domains with trusts from scanning, it should be running the specific command to explore the forests and domain trusts, domains with which the target domain has the trusts enabled.
